page.title: 03FARMING
page.content: In the area there are approximately 20-25 farms.They do not specialise in one type of farming but have a variety of activities.Some concentrate on{ {cattle and sheep}while others participate in{crop growing}dealing with{potatoes,vegetables,corn and {barley.} Work is hard with long hours.An early morning start is essential.For example,cows must be milked every morning at 6am.This may take at least two hours and they are milked again at 5pm. Most farms have large barns where the hay and silage are stored.{Dairy {farmers}in the area have quotas which mean they can only produce a certain amount of milk.Most farms,however,seem to have modern machinery such as{ {tractors and combine harvesters.}
